comment._content: Bar Island on the Hawkesbury? St Johns Church was also the school. GoogleMapsSatellite (we are looking south from the mainland) - maps.google.com.au/maps?ll=-33.52612,151.154537&spn=0... Bar Island Flickr set - www.flickr.com/photos/lightcliff/sets/72157604098560742/

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Thanks for the links beachcomber, it definitely looks a lot like Bar Island. Great research once again!
